attributes.action: Make supermarkets responsible for the provision of full and ample recycling facilities on their large sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To create by law, a compulsory order for all supermarkets on their large sites (designated by parking area or shopper numbers) to provide full and ample recycling facilties enabling customers and the local community to recycle MANY types of household waste.  All types of packaging within which the supermarkets sell their products should be catered for, i.e plastic, paper, cardboard, glass, and different types of metals.  Make these companies responsible for the waste they produce, in the selling of their products, on a local level.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
